# Shooting Menus

## SHARPNESS
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (see page 141).

## HIGH ISO NR
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (see page 142).

## INTERFRAME NR
Select **AUTO** to automatically adjust interframe noise reduction according to shooting conditions.

| Options |        |
|---------|--------|
| AUTO    | OFF    |

> **Note:**  
> "Ghosting" may occur with moving subjects or if the camera is moved during shooting.
